---
title: "David Zhang's CV"
author: David Zhang
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
params:
  pdf_mode:
    value: false
output:
  pagedown::html_resume:
    css: ['dd_cv.css', 'resume']
    self_contained: true
    includes:
      after_body: footer.html
---

```{r, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  results='asis', 
  echo = FALSE
)

library(magrittr) # For the pipe
source("cv_printing_functions.r")

version <- "2025.07.06.0"

# Read in all data and initialize a CV printer object
CV <- create_CV_object(
  data_location = "https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1cX7rMsY_NHVAy2a5-arBEp2gtBMswIc7NoGFwMLwF_o/edit?usp=sharing",  
  pdf_mode = params$pdf_mode
  
)

CV[["entries_data"]] <- CV[["entries_data"]] %>% 
  dplyr::filter(as.logical(in_cv))

```


```{r}
# When in pdf export mode the little dots are unaligned, so fix that with some conditional CSS.
if(params$pdf_mode) {
    cat("
<style>
:root{
  --decorator-outer-offset-left: -6.5px;
}
</style>")
}
```
